name: all-sydney-and-all-regional-filters;issue-lt-275a-text-view-regression-sprint6-browser-chrome-context-chrome-feature-lt25-text-view-lt-273-text-view-of-incidents-capability-lt-25-text-view

tags.name: LT 25 Text View/LT-273 Text View of Incidents

title: All Sydney and All Regional filters

testSteps.description: Given I am at the LiveTraffic Website
Then I click on the menu button
Then I click "List View" button from the menu list

And I should see filters for "All Sydney"
| Region |
| Sydney Inner |
| Sydney North |
| Sydney South |
| Sydney West |

And I should see filters for "All Regional"
| Region |
| Regional NSW West |
| Regional NSW South |
| Regional NSW North |
And I should see "All Sydney" filter is turned on by default
And I should see "All Regional" filter is turned on by default
And I should see "All incident types" filter is turned off by default
When I turn off the "All Sydney" filter
When I turn off the "All Regional" filter
Then I should see No data message heading as "No incidents match your selection"

Then I should see appropriate incident for below filters
| Filter_ON | Incident_Name |
| All Sydney | 1Millers Point |
When I turn off the "All Sydney" filter

Then I should see appropriate incident for below filters
| Filter_ON | Incident_Name |
| All Regional | Kosciuszko National Park |
